body_html:
Btw, not too strong opinion on this. This is a typical trade-off between API stability and future maintenance. @aaroey should make the final call because you are going to maintain this from TF side.

I'm fine with

// This check should appear very early in ConvertGraphDefToTensorRT. 
if (use_calibration and not int8) {
  LOG(ERROR) << "not implemented. fall back to no calibration";
  use_calibration = false;
}

engine_type = (is_dyn_op || use_calibration) ? dynamic : static;
